comments.author: Julian Reschke
comments.body: Go ahead (in general: +1 for avoiding null return values/parameters).

description: Javadoc of the mentioned methods currently states: @return an array containing the property definitions or * null if not set. while the default implementation returns an empty array, which i find much nicer. if nobody objects, i would fix the javadoc accordingly.
summary: SPI: Javadoc Issue with QNodeTypeDefinition#getPropertyDefs and #getChildNodeDefs
